summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account from March 1, 2015, to March 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance, highlighting significant financial activities during that period.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the account holder for the business checking account detailed in this financial statement, which outlines his financial transactions during March 2015.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

persons.name: M. Rites S. McCorquodale
persons.context: M. Rites S. McCorquodale is mentioned as a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Epstein's account.

connections.description: M. Rites S. McCorquodale is a recipient of outgoing money transfers from Jeffrey Epstein's account.

events.title: Beginning of Account Statement Period

events.title: End of Account Statement Period
events.description: The financial statement concludes with the ending balance as of March 31, 2015.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The document details financial transactions for Jeffrey Epstein's business checking account for March 2015.
The account had a beginning balance of $190,815.95 and an ending balance of $369,895.33.
Significant transactions included multiple preauthorized debits and outgoing money transfers.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for assistance regarding the account.
M. Rites S. McCorquodale received outgoing transfers from Epstein's account.
